scripts.build-deps: cd common && npm run build && cd ../redpacket && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: rimraf lib && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.build-all: rimraf lib && npm run build-deps && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.serve: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{doppler: .}')" firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.shell: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{doppler: .}')" firebase functions:shell
scripts.secrets-sync: firebase functions:config:unset doppler && firebase functions:config:set doppler="$(doppler secrets download --no-file)"
scripts.deploy: npm run secrets-sync && firebase deploy --only functions
